price: الله آفریدگار هر چیزی است و او تعالی بر همه چیز [نگهبان و] کارساز است.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَكِيلٞ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-lahu khāliqu kulli shayin wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin wakīlun
